name: Motocross Stunt: Bike Racing
description:
Motocross Stunt: Bike Racing is a new and exciting physics based motocross bike stunt game. Turn the key and start your bike, pull the stifle and push for enjoy life to wrapper on the bike ride of you. The bike stunt Trail racing fever has a realistic bike stunt and real bike physics dangerous tricky path trail track. This game has a real game play.
Features
Become a real stunt master
Tricky and crazy motorbike stunts
Stunning HD graphics and camera view
Challenging stunts and smooth controls
Easy to play and user friendly
Sound effects and obstacles to jump off
